author: Slidebean
description:
Meta’s AI shake up: layoffs, poaching, and consolidation.

Meta just laid off 600 AI researchers, weeks after stealing 50 from OpenAI and Google.
The company says it’s “reorganizing around LAA,” but that really means less R&D, more products.
This could reshape the AI job market, cool down salaries, and speed up open source releases.
But the question remains, are they consolidating innovation, or control?

👉Hear the full breakdown on The Slidebean Stand-Up; streaming now on Spotify, Apple Podcasts, and all major podcast platforms.
title: Meta’s AI layoffs reveal a bigger shift in the industry
